blueprint.description: Installs KiTTY on macOS or Linux
blueprint.overview: [KiTTY](https://sw.kovidgoyal.net/kitty/) is designed for power keyboard users. To that end all its controls work with the keyboard (although it fully supports mouse interactions as well). Its configuration is a simple, human editable, single file for easy reproducibility.
blueprint.name: KiTTY
blueprint.title: KiTTY
